Services.title: WHAT SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
Services.description1: At World Wide Travel, we offer comfortable and safe trips from Chișinău to your favorite destinations in Europe. Our modern minibuses and buses are equipped to ensure you have a relaxing journey. Our experienced drivers will get you to your destination safely and on time.
Services.description2: With our parcel delivery service, you can send packages quickly and safely from Chișinău to cities in Austria, Germany, France, and Switzerland. We ensure prompt delivery and treat each parcel with care and attention.
Services.parcelInfoText1: For larger parcels, the rate is calculated per unit. Please contact our office or visit us in person to determine the rate.
Services.parcelInfoText2: Collection and delivery of parcels are carried out throughout the territory of the Republic of Moldova and Switzerland. Depending on the needs, transportation can be done in refrigerated chambers.

Features.title: WHY OUR TEAM?
Features.featuresBoldText: At World Wide Travel, we are dedicated to providing you with high-quality passenger and parcel transportation services, with regular departures from Chișinău.
Features.featuresCheckText_1_Description: We ensure that every trip is safe and comfortable for you.
Features.featuresCheckText_2_Description: Our drivers are experienced and dedicated to providing you with the best service.
Features.featuresCheckText_3_Description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices.

Footer.footerInfo: For more information about our services or to make a reservation, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Footer.copyright: Copyright © World Wide Travel all rights reserved.
